original: Lindholm, Rudolf Gustav, ekonomichef, Linköping, f. 16/9/97 i Björkeberg, östergöti. 1., av Gustaf Adolf L. o. Emma Olsson. G. 25 m. Maja Eje-man. Barn: Irving f. 26, Birgit 29. — Genomg. handelssk. samt bedriv, priv. studier. Repr. f. Linköp. Li-tograf. A-B 19-26, därefter kamrer o. numera ekon :chef v. Tidn. A-B östgöten. Medl. av Pubhklubben o. Sv. tidn :utg :fören.
translated: Lindholm, Rudolf Gustav, economic manager, Linköping, b. 16/9/97 in Björkeberg, Östergötland. 1st son of Gustaf Adolf L. and Emma Olsson. Married on 25th to Maja Eje-man. Children: Irving b. 26, Birgit b. 29. - Attended commercial school and pursued private studies. Representative for Linköping Lithographic Company (AB) from 19-26, then accountant and currently economic manager at Tidn. AB Östgöten. Member of Pubhklubben and Swedish Newspaper Publishers' Association.

education.description: Attended commercial school and pursued private studies
